title: why same style same font comes out different in my text?
content:
Hi, can someone help me please with this. I would like to use that kind of font in my project, but can't find out how to replicate the style.

The font/text I'm trying to use is found on the url - [https://www.onnit.com/spirulina-chlorella/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150425045019/https:/www.onnit.com/spirulina-chlorella/ "https://www.onnit.com/spirulina-chlorella/")

It all the content text used on the onnit website.

If I copy this same text and paste it in my content, and than see the "source" code, it says

But when I put the same text under same style, it is different, - it also makes the paragraph seen of slightly another length.

It is different.

Please can anyone please help me out with this issue?

Thanks a lot,

Best regards  
Sander
author: olaola

comments.content:
i don't know why it has hidden this line that i wrote after "it says" :

\*\*\*span style="color: rgb(61, 64, 66); font-family: proxima-nova, 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16.3636360168457px; line-height: 24px;"\*\*\*

I don't know your level of expertise when it comes to coding websites, so maybe you've considered the following already.

The most obvious and basic of several possibilities is that you don't have access to the font that's specified in the code (Proxima Nova). If that's the case, what will display is the next available font that's listed, which seems to be Helvetica Neue, Helvetica and Arial in that order.
